Overview If you are using DFSEC, ensure you have enabled DFSEC using
before performing this procedure. By Default DFSEC is disabled in this release.
This procedure provides instructions on how to update the persisted version to a specified load value. To update the persisted version to a specified load value:

step.cmd: Log in to the Active OAME VM as tpaadmin.

info.p: where SPS_20_0_I99 is the IBUILD value of the TO load.
